name: Stone
weapon/property: Brittle. Stone weapons will break after 3 stunts are used with them.
armor/property: Brittle. Stone armor breaks after it is hit by 3 stunts.

name: Wood

armor/property: Effects vary based on type of wood used. Consult with the GM.

name: Bone
weapon/property: Effects vary based on what creature the bone came from. Consult with the GM.
armor/property: Effects vary based on what creature the bone came from. Consult with the GM.

name: Hide
armor/property: Effects vary based on what creature the hide came from. Consult with the GM.
